text: (muḥmiṉkaḷē!) Maṟumaiyil nīṅkaḷ virumpiya paṭiyō, allatu vētattaiyuṭaiyavarkaḷ virumpiya paṭiyō naṭantu viṭuvatillai - evaṉ tīmai ceykiṟāṉō, avaṉ ataṟkuriya taṇṭaṉai vaḻaṅkappaṭuvāṉ;. Iṉṉum avaṉ (aṅku) allāhvait tavira vēṟu yāraiyum (taṉakkup) pātukāvalaṉākavō, tuṇai ceypavaṉākavō kāṇa māṭṭāṉ
